body: {"title": "Innovative Teaching Methods in Higher Education", "abstract": "This comprehensive study examines the effectiveness of innovative teaching methods in university classrooms, focusing on student engagement and learning outcomes in undergraduate courses.", "authors": ["Dr. Sarah Johnson", "Prof. Michael Chen", "Dr. Emily Rodriguez"], "publicationDate": "2024-01-15", "keywords": "higher education, teaching methods, student engagement, undergraduate, university", "description": "A detailed analysis of modern pedagogical approaches in higher education settings", "sourceUrl": "https://example.com/publications/innovative-teaching-methods"}
